subtitleNullable: User Behavior and Demographics in a C2C Fashion Store
descriptionNullable:
_____
# C2C Fashion Store User Data
### User Behavior and Demographics in a C2C Fashion Store
By Jeffrey Mvutu Mabilama [[source]](https://data.world/jfreex)
_____

### About this dataset
> This dataset provides valuable information on the behavior, demographics, and activity of users on a C2C fashion store. The data was collected from a successful online store that first launched in Europe around 2009 and has since expanded worldwide, amassing over 9 million registered users. 
> 
> The dataset includes various features that shed light on user engagement and preferences within the platform. Some notable features include:
> 
> - **Mean Products Liked**: The average number of products liked by each user.
> - **Top Mean Products Liked**: The average number of products liked by top buyers.
> - **Seniority as Months**: The seniority level of the user in terms of months.
> - **Top Mean Followers**: The average number of followers top buyers have.
> - **Country Sold Ratio**: The ratio of products sold in each country to the total products sold on the C2C fashion store.
> - **Mean Followers**: The average number of followers each user has.
> - **Female Buyers Ratio**: The ratio of female buyers to total buyers.
> - **Top Sellers**: The number of top sellers on the C2C fashion store.
>  -**Has Profile Picture**: Indicates whether the user has a profile picture.
> 
> These features offer insights into various aspects such as user preferences, activity levels, seniority, follower count, and sales patterns across different countries. Additionally, there are categorical variables such as language preference, gender, type (private or professional), civility title (Mr., Mrs., etc.), and mobile app usage.
> 
> By exploring this dataset, one can gain valuable insights into e-commerce user behavior and make informed decisions regarding marketing strategies targeting specific demographics or optimizing platform features based on users' preferences.
> 
> This dataset serves as a benchmark for understanding what to expect from users in an e-commerce fashion store. It can also help businesses better understand their own performance by comparing it with data from this comprehensive dataset.
> 
> Overall, this dataset provides valuable information for analyzing e-commerce user behavior, demographics, and activity, allowing businesses to make data-driven decisions to enhance user experience and drive growth

### How to use the dataset
> 
> Introduction:
> 
> - Understand User Demographics:
> - The dataset includes information about users' gender, country, language preference, civility title, and profile picture status. You can analyze these variables to gain insights into your target audience's demographics.
> 
> - Explore User Activity:
> - The dataset contains various variables that indicate user activity such as total products bought/liked/wished/sold/listed, average number of products bought/liked/wished/listed/followed/followers/offline days.
> - By analyzing these variables, you can understand user engagement levels with the platform and identify patterns or trends in user behavior.
> 
> - Analyze Top Buyers and Sellers:
> - The dataset includes information about top buyers (users who made the most purchases) and top sellers (users who listed the most products).
> - You can explore variables like topmeanproductsbought/topmeanproductsliked/topmeanfollowing for top buyers or topmeanproductslisted/topsellerratio/bestsoldratio for top sellers.
> - Comparing these metrics with overall averages can help identify high-performing users or understand characteristics of successful buyers/sellers.
> 
> - Understand Engagement on Social Network Features:
> - The dataset provides information about users' social network activity such as socialNbFollowers/socialNbFollows/socialProductsLiked.
> - You can analyze these variables to understand whether users are interested in social network features within an e-commerce platform.
> 
> - Explore Country-wise Analysis:
> - The dataset includes information about countries where users are located (country/countryCode).
>   - You can analyze countrysoldratio/bestsoldratio to understand product demand in different countries.
>   - Buyers-repartition-by-country.csv/Countries-with-Top-Sellers-(Fashion-C2C).csv provide additional information on the distribution of buyers and top sellers by country.
> 
> - Analyze Seniority and User Activity:
> - The dataset provides information about users' seniority (seniority/seniorityAsMonths/seniorityAsYears).
> - You can explore variables like meanofflinedays/topmeanofflinedays/daysSinceLastLogin to understand user activity patterns based on their seniority.
> 
> - Explore User Preferences and Apps:
> - The dataset includes variables like type, language

### Research Ideas
> - Market Analysis: The dataset can be used to analyze the behavior, demographics, and activity of users on a C2C fashion store. This can provide insights into user preferences, buying patterns, and engagement levels. It can help in identifying potential target markets and tailoring marketing strategies accordingly.
> - User Engagement: The dataset can be used to measure user engagement metrics such as average number of products liked, followers, following, wishlist items, etc. This can help in understanding how active users are on the platform and identifying ways to improve user engagement.
> - Performance Benchmarking: The dataset provides a benchmark for comparing the performance of an e-commerce fashion store with regard to user activity and behavior. By comparing metrics such as number of buyers/sellers, products listed/sold/wished/liked per user or top buyer/seller ratios with those in the dataset, businesses can assess their own performance and identify areas for improvement

### Acknowledgements
> If you use this dataset in your research, please credit the original authors.
> [Data Source](https://data.world/jfreex)
> 
>


### License
> 
> 
> **License: [CC0 1.0 Universal (CC0 1.0) - Public Domain Dedication](https://creativecommons.org/publicdomain/zero/1.0/)**
> No Copyright - You can copy, modify, distribute and perform the work, even for commercial purposes, all without asking permission. [See Other Information](https://creativecommons.org/publicdomain/zero/1.0/).

### Columns

**File: Buyers-repartition-by-country.csv**
| Column name                   | Description                                                                                     |
|:------------------------------|:------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
| **country**                   | The country of residence of the user. (Categorical)                                             |
| **buyers**                    | The total number of users who have made a purchase on the platform. (Numeric)                   |
| **topbuyers**                 | The number of top buyers on the platform. (Numeric)                                             |
| **topbuyerratio**             | The ratio of top buyers to total buyers on the platform. (Numeric)                              |
| **femalebuyers**              | The number of female buyers on the platform. (Numeric)                                          |
| **topfemalebuyers**           | The number of top female buyers on the platform. (Numeric)                                      |
| **topmalebuyers**             | The number of top male buyers on the platform. (Numeric)                                        |
| **femalebuyersratio**         | The ratio of female buyers to total buyers on the platform. (Numeric)                           |
| **topfemalebuyersratio**      | The ratio of top female buyers to total buyers on the platform. (Numeric)                       |
| **boughtperwishlistratio**    | The ratio of products bought to products wished for in wishlists. (Numeric)                     |
| **boughtperlikeratio**        | The ratio of products bought to products liked. (Numeric)                                       |
| **topboughtperwishlistratio** | The ratio of products bought by top buyers to products wished for in wishlists. (Numeric)       |
| **topboughtperlikeratio**     | The ratio of products bought by top buyers to products liked. (Numeric)                         |
| **totalproductsbought**       | The total number of products bought on the platform. (Numeric)                                  |
| **totalproductswished**       | The total number of products wished for in wishlists on the platform. (Numeric)                 |
| **totalproductsliked**        | The total number of products liked on the platform. (Numeric)                                   |
| **toptotalproductsbought**    | The total number of products bought by top buyers on the platform. (Numeric)                    |
| **toptotalproductswished**    | The total number of products wished for in wishlists by top buyers on the platform. (Numeric)   |
| **toptotalproductsliked**     | The total number of products liked by top buyers on the platform. (Numeric)                     |
| **meanproductsbought**        | The average number of products bought by users on the platform. (Numeric)                       |
| **meanproductswished**        | The average number of products wished for in wishlists by users on the platform. (Numeric)      |
| **meanproductsliked**         | The average number of products liked by users on the platform. (Numeric)                        |
| **topmeanproductsbought**     | The average number of products bought by top buyers on the platform. (Numeric)                  |
| **topmeanproductswished**     | The average number of products wished for in wishlists by top buyers on the platform. (Numeric) |
| **topmeanproductsliked**      | The average number of products liked by top buyers on the platform. (Numeric)                   |
| **meanofflinedays**           | The average number of days a user has been offline on the platform. (Numeric)                   |
| **topmeanofflinedays**        | The average number of days a top buyer has been offline on the platform. (Numeric)              |
| **meanfollowers**             | The average number of followers a user has on social networks. (Numeric)                        |
| **meanfollowing**             | The average number of users a user is following on social networks. (Numeric)                   |
| **topmeanfollowers**          | The average number of followers a top buyer has on social networks. (Numeric)                   |
| **topmeanfollowing**          | The average number of users a top buyer is following on social networks. (Numeric)              |

_____

**File: Countries-with-Top-Sellers-(Fashion-C2C).csv**
| Column name                | Description                                                                                                |
|:---------------------------|:-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
| **country**                | The country of residence of the user. (Categorical)                                                        |
| **meanofflinedays**        | The average number of days a user has been offline on the platform. (Numeric)                              |
| **topmeanofflinedays**     | The average number of days a top buyer has been offline on the platform. (Numeric)                         |
| **meanfollowers**          | The average number of followers a user has on social networks. (Numeric)                                   |
| **meanfollowing**          | The average number of users a user is following on social networks. (Numeric)                              |
| **topmeanfollowers**       | The average number of followers a top buyer has on social networks. (Numeric)                              |
| **topmeanfollowing**       | The average number of users a top buyer is following on social networks. (Numeric)                         |
| **sellers**                | The total number of sellers on the C2C fashion store. (Numeric)                                            |
| **topsellers**             | The number of top sellers on the C2C fashion store. (Numeric)                                              |
| **topsellerratio**         | The ratio of top sellers to total sellers on the C2C fashion store. (Numeric)                              |
| **femalesellersratio**     | The ratio of female sellers to total sellers on the C2C fashion store. (Numeric)                           |
| **topfemalesellersratio**  | The ratio of female top sellers to total top sellers on the C2C fashion store. (Numeric)                   |
| **topmalesellers**         | The number of male top sellers on the C2C fashion store. (Numeric)                                         |
| **countrysoldratio**       | The ratio of sales made in each country to the total sales on the C2C fashion store. (Numeric)             |
| **bestsoldratio**          | The ratio of sales made in the best-selling country to the total sales on the C2C fashion store. (Numeric) |
| **toptotalproductssold**   | The total number of products sold by the top sellers on the C2C fashion store. (Numeric)                   |
| **toptotalproductslisted** | The total number of products listed by the top sellers on the C2C fashion store. (Numeric)                 |
| **topmeanproductssold**    | The average number of products sold by the top sellers on the C2C fashion store. (Numeric)                 |
| **topmeanproductslisted**  | The average number of products listed by the top sellers on the C2C fashion store. (Numeric)               |

_____

**File: 6M-0K-99K.users.dataset.public.csv**
| Column name             | Description                                                                                                             |
|:------------------------|:------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
| **country**             | The country of residence of the user. (Categorical)                                                                     |
| **type**                | The type of user, either private or professional. (Categorical)                                                         |
| **language**            | The preferred language of the user for communication or product descriptions. (Categorical)                             |
| **socialNbFollowers**   | The number of followers the user has on social media. (Numeric)                                                         |
| **socialNbFollows**     | The number of users the user follows on social media. (Numeric)                                                         |
| **socialProductsLiked** | The number of products the user has liked on social media. (Numeric)                                                    |
| **productsListed**      | The number of products the user has listed for sale. (Numeric)                                                          |
| **productsSold**        | The number of products the user has sold. (Numeric)                                                                     |
| **productsPassRate**    | The pass rate of the user's products, indicating the percentage of products that have been successfully sold. (Numeric) |
| **productsWished**      | The number of products the user has added to their wishlist. (Numeric)                                                  |
| **productsBought**      | The number of products the user has bought. (Numeric)                                                                   |
| **gender**              | The gender of the user. (Categorical)                                                                                   |
| **civilityTitle**       | The civility title of the user (e.g., Mr., Mrs., etc.). (Categorical)                                                   |
| **hasAnyApp**           | Indicates whether the user has any mobile app for the platform. (Boolean)                                               |
| **hasIosApp**           | Indicates whether the user has an iOS app installed for the platform. (Boolean)                                         |
| **hasProfilePicture**   | Indicates whether the user has a profile picture. (Boolean)                                                             |
| **daysSinceLastLogin**  | The number of days since the user's last login. (Numeric)                                                               |
| **seniority**           | The seniority level of the user in months and years. (Numeric)                                                          |
| **seniorityAsMonths**   | The seniority level of the user in months. (Numeric)                                                                    |
| **seniorityAsYears**    | The seniority level of the user in years. (Numeric)                                                                     |
| **countryCode**         | The country code of the user's country of residence. (Categorical)                                                      |

### Acknowledgements
> If you use this dataset in your research, please credit the original authors.
> If you use this dataset in your research, please credit [Jeffrey Mvutu Mabilama](https://data.world/jfreex).
